description.plain: Viral phenomenon also known as “The Walmart Yodeling Boy” who set the Internet on fire when video of him yodeling in an Illinois Walmart was published on YouTube. He released his first single “Famous” in 2018. He began singing the songs of Hank Williams Sr. at three years old. He performed at Coachella 2018 with DJ Ethan Snoreck, AKA Whethan. He would surpass more than 1.8 million followers on the Instagram account lilhankwilliams.  His grandmother Frances Ramsey has managed his Instagram account. He got to hang out with Justin Bieber while at Coachella 2018.

body.plain: Viral phenomenon also known as “The Walmart Yodeling Boy” who set the Internet on fire when video of him yodeling in an Illinois Walmart was published on YouTube. He released his first single “Famous” in 2018. He began singing the songs of Hank Williams Sr. at three years old. He performed at Coachella 2018 with DJ Ethan Snoreck, AKA Whethan. He would surpass more than 1.8 million followers on the Instagram account lilhankwilliams.  His grandmother Frances Ramsey has managed his Instagram account. He got to hang out with Justin Bieber while at Coachella 2018.

songs.title: Famous

description.plain:
Mason Ramsey, a.k.a. the “Walmart Yodeling Boy”, faces his newfound fame head on in his first new single.

The eleven-year-old has exploded into the musical scene, performing all across the country, most notably at the revered music festival, Coachella with electronic producer Whethan.

However, in this song, he deflects this fame from his music to his attitude about how a girl ought to be treated romantically. While he is young, he certainly knows the importance of treating his significant other right.

songs.embed_content: Read “Famous” by Mason Ramsey on Genius

body.plain:
Mason Ramsey, a.k.a. the “Walmart Yodeling Boy”, faces his newfound fame head on in his first new single.

The eleven-year-old has exploded into the musical scene, performing all across the country, most notably at the revered music festival, Coachella with electronic producer Whethan.

However, in this song, he deflects this fame from his music to his attitude about how a girl ought to be treated romantically. While he is young, he certainly knows the importance of treating his significant other right.

songs.lyrics:
38 ContributorsFamous Lyrics[Verse 1]
Don't get me wrong, it's pretty cool to be on TV
So all the folks back home can see me
And that I'm livin' it out
All the things I used to dream about
Yeah, it's pretty great, singin' on a stage
Proud 'cause there ain't an empty seat in the place
But, girl, ever since I met you
I got a whole new perspective

[Chorus]
If I'm gonna be famous for somethin'
I wanna be famous for lovin' you
If I'm gonna be known around the world
I wanna because of you, girl
Nothin' wrong with the center of attention
Long as I'm with you, I don't mind the pictures
If I'm gonna be famous for somethin'
Girl, I wanna be famous for lovin' you
Famous for lovin' you

[Verse 2]
Yeah, I hope the first question people ask me
Is "How's your girl and how's your family?"
I could go on and on and on
Talkin' 'bout you for days
You can bet when I hear, "Congratulations"
Want it to be because we made it
Another five years
Best thing I got is right here
You might also like[Chorus]
If I'm gonna be famous for somethin'
I wanna be famous for lovin' you
If I'm gonna be known around the world
I wanna because of you, girl
Nothin' wrong with the center of attention
Long as I'm with you, I don't mind the pictures
If I'm gonna be famous for somethin'
Girl, I wanna be famous for lovin' you
Ooh, famous for lovin' you, ooh
If I'm gonna be famous for somethin'
I wanna be famous for lovin' you
If I'm gonna be known around the world
I wanna because of you, girl
And if I'm gonna go down in history
I hope it's all 'cause of you and me
If I'm gonna be famous for somethin’
Girl, I wanna be famous for lovin' you
Famous for lovin' you
Famous for lovin' you13Embed

songs.full_title: Lovesick Blues (Walmart Performance) by Mason Ramsey
songs.title: Lovesick Blues (Walmart Performance)

description.plain:
NOTE: This is Lil Hank Williams’s rendition of the classic country song “Lovesick Blues”. Although there are some similarities between this version and the original song, the lyrics are distinct enough to the point where it’s appropriate to consider them 2 unique songs.  

“Lovesick Blues” is a song about a man who finds himself within a depressive state of mind due to his reminiscing of a previous lover.
The original “Lovesick Blues” first appeared in the 1922 musical “Oh, Ernest”. However, the first person to record it, which was Emmett Miller, didn’t do so until 6 years after it first appeared in the musical. Although there were a number of other musicians who recorded their own cover of the song since Miller, the most significant and  notable person to cover “Lovesick Blues” was the renowned country artist known as Hank Williams Sr,. who started performing the song in 1948. Hank Williams Sr. is the favorite artist of 10 year-old musician Mason Ramsey (otherwise known as Lil Hank Williams).
On March 24th, 2018, while Mason Ramsey was at his local Walmart, a lady recognized him from a past performance of his and she requested him to perform a song. In an interview later that week, Ramsey said, “…if someone asks me for a song I won’t turn them down”. Staying true to that principle, Lil Hank Williams spontaneously performed “Lovesick Blues” right in the middle of Walmart.
“Lovesick Blues” is one of his favorite songs by one of his favorite artists (Hank Williams Sr.). The song is quite difficult to perform due to the multiple parts that require yodeling. Despite that, Lil Hank Williams’s a cappella performance of “Lovesick Blues” was nothing short of spectacular. His exhibition displayed his underrated natural talent and well trained, musical voice. It is likely that Ramsey’s performance surpassed the expectations of the majority of the video’s viewers, due to the fact that his age and inexperience would cause them to expect less of him.
Mason Ramsey’s video went viral virtually instantaneously. In less than 2 and a half weeks, it had 5.5 million views on Instagram. Also, Lil Hank Williams’s performance spread so quickly that it earned the young superstar multiple shout outs from several celebrities, primarily ones from musicians Steve Aoki and The Chainsmokers, as well as a “dance tribute” from Stranger Things actor Millie Bobby Brown.
In addition, the publicity has caused Walmart to put on a concert at the same branch he performed in originally to “let him shine!” On top of all of that, a follow-up tweet from the  company asked a variety of music artists if they would be willing to do a show with Lil Hank Williams. Some of these artists included Snoop Dogg, Blake Shelton, and Katy Perry.

songs.embed_content: Read “Lovesick Blues (Walmart Performance)” by Mason Ramsey on Genius

songs.full_title: Used To You by Foreign Air
songs.title: Used To You

songs.lyrics:
22 ContributorsLovesick Blues (Walmart Performance) Lyrics[Pre-Chorus]
Hey lord I don't know what I'll do
All I do is sit and sigh, oh lord
The last long day she said goodbye
Well lord, I thought I would cry

[Chorus]
She'll do me, she'll do you, she's got that kind of loving
Lord I love to hear her when she calls me sweet daddy
Such a beautiful dream
I hate to think it's all over;
I lost my heart it seems
I've grown so used to you somehow
But I'm nobody's sugar daddy now
And I'm lonesome
I got the lovesick blues

[Verse]
Well I'm in love, I'm in love with a beautiful gal
That's what's the matter with me
I'm In love, I'm in love with a beautiful gal
But she don't care about me
And I tried and tried to keep her satisfied
But she just wouldn't stay
So now that she is leaving
This is all I can say
I got a feeling called the blues, oh lord
Since my baby say goodbye
You might also like[Pre-Chorus]
Hey lord I don't know what I'll do
All I do is sit and sigh, oh lord
The last long day she said goodbye
Well lord, I thought I would cry

[Chorus]
She'll do me, she'll do you, she's got that kind of loving
Lord I love to hear her when she calls me sweet daddy
Such a beautiful dream
I hate to think it's all over;
I lost my heart it seems
I've grown so used to you somehow
But I'm nobody's sugar daddy now
And I'm lonesome
I got the lovesick blues6Embed

songs.full_title: Before I Knew It by Mason Ramsey
songs.title: Before I Knew It

description.plain: This song is about how Mason has felt, considering his younger self, before he met the girl he liked; and before he knew it, he was doing kind things for her that he thought he wouldn’t do.

songs.embed_content: Read “Before I Knew It” by Mason Ramsey on Genius

annotatable.link_title: Before I Knew It by Mason Ramsey
annotatable.title: Before I Knew It

body.plain: This song is about how Mason has felt, considering his younger self, before he met the girl he liked; and before he knew it, he was doing kind things for her that he thought he wouldn’t do.

songs.lyrics:
8 ContributorsBefore I Knew It Lyrics[Verse 1]
Yeah, I used to be the guy that talked about the guy
I've been turnin' into, ever since I met you
But I ain't gonna lie, kinda like this table for two
With you
Yeah, I was driftin' round from town to town
Wasn't ever gonna settle for the settlin' down
But you turned that around, saw a side of me I never knew
Yeah, it's true

[Chorus]
Before I knew it, I was holdin' all the doors, holdin' your hand
Gettin' off of work just as fast as I can
Callin' you up, askin' what you're doin'
Girl, before I knew it
Before I knew it, I was spendin' my time, spendin' my paycheck
All around you, girl, I gotta say, this
Whole love thing, I thought I'd never do it
But that's before I knew it, that's before I knew it

[Verse 2]
Now, I ain't missing those lonely nights
I found myself another keepin' kind
Blonde hair, blue eyes, out of the blue
I never saw it comin'
You might also like[Chorus]
Before I knew it, I was holdin' all the doors, holdin' your hand
Gettin' off of work just as fast as I can
Callin' you up, askin' what you're doin'
Girl, before I knew it
Before I knew it, I was spendin' my time, spendin' my paycheck
All around you, girl, I gotta say, this
Whole love thing, I thought I'd never do it
But that's before I knew it, that's before I knew it

[Bridge]
Before I knew I was talkin' 'bout a ring
Talkin' 'bout a house
Thinkin' 'bout things that I never thought about
Who would have knew it?

[Chorus]
Before I knew it, I was holdin' all the doors, holdin' your hand
Gettin' off of work just as fast as I can
Callin' you up, askin' what you're doin'
Girl, before I knew it
Before I knew it, I was spendin' my time, spendin' my paycheck
All around you, girl, I gotta say, this
Whole love thing, I thought I'd never do it
But that's before I knew it, that's before I knew it
[Outro]
Before I knew it
Oh, this old love thing
Before I knew it1Embed
